employment.title: Web Developer
employment.description: Assisted the Digital and IT teams in developing and analyzing digital media campaigns for web and mobile products.

employment.title: Systems Analyst
employment.description: Provided technical support for clinical and administrative staff at various practices and facilities using Epic's Cadence (Scheduling) and Prelude (Registration) systems.

employment.title: Code Coach
employment.description: Assisted and mentored kids in developing computer programming skills.

employment.title: Programmer/Analyst
employment.description: Provided data management support and assisting the end-user community with the development of database web applications for data entry purposes and prepare reports for end users.

employment.title: Data Analyst
employment.description: Provided patients and their caregivers with the knowledge, skills and resources to transition smoothly through the continuum of healthcare from hospitalization to a return to the community.

employment.title: Programmer
employment.description: Worked on side projects and real-world digital products and services in a wide array of languages and tools to enhance a better online experience.

employment.title: Webmaster Intern
employment.description: Created brand-new website from scratch and expanded publicity throughout campus.

employment.title: IT Intern
employment.description: Assisted in repairing software and hardware at several hospital workstations.

employment.title: Technology Assistant
employment.description: Assisted in the Career Services department on campus, creating Powerpoint presentations and an Access career database.
